title: Development of near homozygous lines for diploid hybrid TPS breeding in potatoes
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Salej Sood, Vinay Bhardwaj, Vikas Mangal, Hemant Kardile, Bhawna Dipta, Ashwani Kumar, Baljeet Singh, Sundaresha Siddappa, Ashwani K. Sharma, Dalamu, Tanuja Buckseth, Babita Chaudhary, Vinod Kumar, N.K. Pandey
